item.title: 经济疲软、新冠疫情肆虐可能导致2023年中国人口再次减少
item.description: China's population likely dropped for a second consecutive year in 2023 due to a surge in COVID-related deaths after the country abruptly ended strict lockdowns, while weak confidence in the economy's prospects keeps birth rates depressed.翻译:由于中国突然结束严格的封锁，与新冠病毒相关的死亡人数激增，2023年中国人口可能连续第二年下降，而对经济前景的信心疲弱导致出生率低迷。
item.author: Farah Master

item.title: 马尔代夫总统因与印度关系恶化而吸引中国投资者
item.description: At an "Invest Maldives" forum in a southern Chinese port city, the Maldivian president shook hands and exchanged words with smiling local officials on a China visit set to deepen bilateral ties as the archipelagic nation pirouettes away from India.翻译:在中国南部港口城市举行的“投资马尔代夫”论坛上，马尔代夫总统与微笑的当地官员握手并交谈，此次中国之行旨在深化双边关系，因为这个群岛国家正在远离印度。
item.author: Ryan Woo

item.title: 中国电动汽车巨头比亚迪将于下周在印度尼西亚推出汽车 - 公司
item.description: China's BYD , the world's biggest seller of battery electric vehicles (BEVs), will launch its cars in Indonesia next week, the company said on Tuesday.翻译:中国比亚迪公司周二表示，该公司是全球最大的纯电动汽车（BEV）销售商，该公司将于下周在印度尼西亚推出其汽车。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 不丹在最后一轮全国选举中投票，经济是主要问题
item.description: Bhutan began voting on Tuesday, the final round of national parliamentary elections that will form the Himalayan kingdom’s fourth government since democracy was established 15 years ago, with economic growth the main issue in the wake of COVID-19.翻译:不丹于周二开始投票，这是最后一轮全国议会选举，该选举将组建喜马拉雅王国自 15 年前建立民主以来的第四届政府，经济增长是新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 疫情后的主要问题。
item.author: Gopal Sharma

item.title: 香港领导人表示国泰航空需要解决运力问题
item.description: Plans by Hong Kong's Cathay Pacific Airways to slash flights during the busy Lunar New Year period show the airline needs to address its capacity problems, the city's leader said, while its pilot union called for a government enquiry.翻译:香港领导人表示，香港国泰航空计划在繁忙的农历新年期间削减航班，这表明该航空公司需要解决运力问题，而其飞行员工会则呼吁政府进行调查。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: TikTok 所有者字节跳动正在与腾讯等公司洽谈出售游戏资产
item.description: TikTok owner ByteDance said on Tuesday it is in talks with multiple prospective buyers of its gaming assets, including the world's largest video games company, Tencent , as the Chinese social media firm retreats from the gaming industry.翻译:TikTok 母公司字节跳动周二表示，随着这家中国社交媒体公司退出游戏行业，该公司正在与其游戏资产的多个潜在买家进行谈判，其中包括全球最大的视频游戏公司腾讯。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 投资者等待美国通胀数据，亚洲股市走高
item.description: Asian stocks advanced on Tuesday after a tech-led rally on Wall Street as investors look to the next set of U.S inflation numbers due this week, which could provide further clarity on when the Federal Reserve might start cutting interest rates.翻译:在华尔街科技股领涨后，亚洲股市周二上涨，因投资者关注本周公布的下一组美国通胀数据，该数据可能进一步明确美联储何时可能开始降息。
item.author: Scott Murdoch

item.title: 台湾执政党候选人将维持现状与中国接触
item.description: Taiwan's ruling party presidential candidate Lai Ching-te said on Tuesday he would maintain the status quo and pursue peace through strength if elected, remaining open to engagement with Beijing under the preconditions of equality and dignity.翻译:台湾执政党总统候选人赖清德周二表示，如果当选，他将维持现状并通过实力追求和平，并在平等和尊严的前提下对与北京接触保持开放态度。
item.author: Sarah Wu

item.title: 台湾国防部称在台湾海峡上空看到四个中国气球
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry said on Tuesday that it had spotted four Chinese balloons over the Taiwan Strait on Monday, two of which crossed Taiwan island.翻译:台湾国防部周二表示，周一在台湾海峡上空发现了四个中国气球，其中两个气球飞越了台湾岛。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美元回落，比特币在 ETF 批准截止日期前上涨
item.description: The dollar paused its rally on Tuesday, as traders reaffirmed their bets for a slew of Federal Reserve rate cuts this year on the belief that inflation in the U.S. is slowing sufficiently.翻译:美元周二暂停涨势，交易员重申了对美联储今年一系列降息的押注，因为他们相信美国通胀已充分放缓。
item.author: Rae Wee

item.title: 美国海军水手因与中国分享军事数据被判入狱27个月
item.description: A U.S. Navy sailor was sentenced to 27 months in jail on Monday for accepting nearly $15,000 in bribes from a Chinese intelligence officer in exchange for photos of unclassified private U.S. military information.翻译:周一，一名美国海军水兵因收受一名中国情报官员近 15,000 美元的贿赂以换取美国非机密私人军事信息的照片而被判处 27 个月监禁。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 亚洲 东京交易员将了解通胀数据并等待美国消费者物价指数 (CPI)
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Alden Bentley

item.title: 英伟达扩大在中国电动汽车领域的影响力
item.description: Nvidia said four Chinese electric vehicle brands will use its technology as the brains for automated driving systems, underscoring the U.S. chip maker's determination to expand in China despite Washington's tighter export rules.翻译:英伟达表示，四个中国电动汽车品牌将使用其技术作为自动驾驶系统的大脑，这突显了这家美国芯片制造商尽管华盛顿实施更严格的出口规定，仍决心在中国扩张。
item.author: Joseph White

item.title: 法国干邑白兰地生产商反击中国反倾销调查
item.description: French cognac makers have hit back at claims by China that they are dumping brandy in the Chinese market, saying the price discounts alleged are unusually small for such a formal investigation.翻译:法国干邑白兰地生产商对中国有关他们在中国市场倾销白兰地的说法进行了反击，称所称的价格折扣对于此类正式调查而言异常小。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: STATBOX 足球-亚洲杯 B 组 - 澳大利亚、乌兹别克斯坦、叙利亚、印度
item.description: Statbox on Group B at the Asian Cup, which will be held in Qatar from Jan. 12 to Feb. 10:翻译:亚洲杯 B 组 Statbox 将于 1 月 12 日至 2 月 10 日在卡塔尔举行：
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：中国堵住地方政府离岸融资漏洞——消息人士
item.description: Chinese regulators have closed a regulatory loophole that last year allowed heavily indebted local government financing vehicles (LGFVs) to further increase their borrowing, four sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.翻译:四位知情人士告诉路透社，中国监管机构去年堵住了一个监管漏洞，该漏洞允许负债累累的地方政府融资平台（LGFV）进一步增加借款。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 杰富瑞 (Jefferies) 2024 年第一周苹果 iPhone 在中国销量下降 30%
item.description: Apple 's iPhone sales in China dropped by 30% in the first week of 2024, Jefferies analysts said in a note, adding to signs of growing competitive pressures from domestic rivals such as Huawei (HWT.UL) for the U.S. tech giant.翻译:杰富瑞 (Jefferies) 分析师在一份报告中表示，2024 年第一周，苹果 iPhone 在中国的销量下降了 30%，这加剧了华为 (HWT.UL) 等国内竞争对手对这家美国科技巨头的竞争压力日益加大的迹象。
item.author: Yelin Mo, Brenda Goh

item.title: 英伟达将于 2024 年第二季度推出专注于中国的 AI 芯片 - 消息人士
item.description: U.S. chipmaker Nvidia plans to begin mass production in the second quarter of 2024 of an artificial intelligence (AI) chip it designed for China to comply with U.S. export rules, two people familiar with the matter said on Monday.翻译:两位知情人士周一表示，美国芯片制造商英伟达计划于 2024 年第二季度开始批量生产其为中国设计的人工智能 (AI) 芯片，以遵守美国的出口规定。
item.author: Yelin Mo, Fanny Potkin

item.title: 独家：中国监管机构取消共同基金股票净卖出禁令
item.description: China's securities regulator is allowing mutual fund managers to sell more shares than they buy each day, three sources said, removing a ban introduced late last year aimed at propping up a flagging stock market.翻译:三名消息人士称，中国证券监管机构允许共同基金经理每天出售的股票数量多于购买的股票数量，从而取消了去年年底推出的旨在支撑低迷股市的禁令。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国恒大电动汽车部门称副董事长被拘留，股价下跌
item.description: China Evergrande New Energy Vehicle Group said on Monday its Vice Chairman Liu Yongzhuo has been detained and is under criminal investigation, sending its stock tumbling and marking another setback after a share sale plan was scrapped.翻译:中国恒大新能源汽车集团周一表示，其副董事长刘永灼已被拘留并正在接受刑事调查，这导致该公司股价暴跌，这是继售股计划被取消后的又一次挫折。
item.author: Clare Jim, Donny Kwok
